com.btmatthews.utils.monitor

Class AbstractServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.AbstractServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Server

    public abstract class AbstractServer
extends Object
implements Server
    Abstract base class for objects that implement the Server interface. This abstract base class provides default implementations for the methods defined by the interface.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

      • isStarted

        public boolean isStarted(Logger logger)
        Invoked by the monitor to check if the server has launched. This default implementation always returns true.
        Specified by:
        isStarted in interface Server
        Parameters:
        logger - Used to log error messages.
        Returns:
        Always returns true.
        Since:
        2.1.0

        public boolean isStopped(Logger logger)
